title: Feature Request: Auto Start/Stop external tool on boot/shutdown
author: NateWerner
body_snippet:
<!-- Feature Request -->
Add ability to auto start/stop external tools from the external config page.  Applied this mod to support starting ssh tools like XMing and Putty Agent while using mRemoteNG.  Useful and more secure to ensure they are shutdown when done using ssh.

Sample:
![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/675525/21435247/5de1ac98-c83e-11e6-90bd-68db830ec103.png)

comments.snippet: Just to clarify, do you mean boot/shutdown of your local machine or mRemoteNG?
comments.author: sparerd

comments.snippet:
mRemoteNG.  So "Startup" means the app itself.  Maybe there is better verbiage for that, maybe "mRemoteNG Startup".

So on the init of mRemoteNG, review the external tools that have this enabled, and spawn a process.  Track the process ID, and stop process if flagged when mRemoteNG is shutdown.
comments.author: NateWerner
